abstract: A proposed deal for Facebook to buy Twitter reportedly broke down over price, echoing Yahoo’s failed deal to buy Facebook two years ago.
snippet: A proposed deal for Facebook to buy Twitter reportedly broke down over price, echoing Yahoo’s failed deal to buy Facebook two years ago.
lead_paragraph: Facebook has walked away from talks to buy Twitter because the $500 million price tag was too high, according to a report by AllThingsD.

headline.main: How Much Is Twitter Worth to Facebook?
